data.title: Beasley Media Group, LLC
data.text:
Beasley Esports announces Matt Iorio has been named General Manager of the Houston Outlaws. He will begin his new role, effectively immediately. Iorio is no stranger to the Overwatch league. As a former player, Matt was ranked as one of the top OWL players in season #1 and had the opportunity to play aside highly […]

Congratulations to Beasley Media Group Vice President and Market Managers Mary Menna (Boston) Joe Bell (Philadelphia) and Kent Dunn (Augusta and Fayetteville) on being named to Radio Ink Magazine’s 2020 Best Managers List! The annual list which celebrates the top managers in the radio industry.

The National Association of Broadcasters (NAB) and the Library of American Broadcasting Foundation (LABF) will co-produce “100 Years of Broadcast News: Challenges Met, Challenges Anew,” a celebration of broadcasting’s centennial with the industry’s leading voices and historians. The NAB Show New York main stage session, hosted by Hubbard Radio Chair and CEO Ginny Morris and

Beasley Esports announces Jae Won Choi, most commonly known as “Junkbuck”, has been named as the new co-head coach of Overwatch League’s Houston Outlaws. He will begin his new role, effective immediately. Junkbuck’s initial charge will be to help finalize the Outlaws’ 2021 Roster under the team’s first full season as part of the Beasley Esports umbrella and

Beasley Media Group is pleased to unveil Your Vote – Your Voice: a special Beasley Best Community of Caring initiative designed to encourage eligible voters to cast their ballot for the upcoming election in November. The initiative will include a variety of recorded :15 and :30 second PSAs as well as custom content that will be featured on across

Beasley Media Group announces Brad Beasley has been promoted to the position of Vice President of Operations at Beasley Media Group. He will officially begin his new role on Monday, October 5, 2020. Beasley most recently served as vice president and market manager of the company’s six Southwest Florida radio cluster. Previously, he held the

Today, Broadcast Music Inc, Beasley Media Group, and Xperi’s HD Radio launched a new series called “100 Years of Hit Makers.” The series is a part of a year-long campaign to celebrate the 100th Anniversary of the first commercial radio broadcast in the U.S., and to highlight the continuing importance of radio, especially in our

NAPLES, Florida, August 4, 2020 – Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: BBGI) (“Beasley” or the “Company”), a multi-platform media company, today announced operating results for the three- and six‑month periods ended June 30, 2020. The results presented herein reflect actual results including the operations of WDMK-FM in Detroit since its acquisition in August 2019. Summary

NAPLES, Florida, July 31, 2020 – Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: BBGI) (“Beasley” or the “Company”), a multi-platform media company, announced today that it will report its 2020 second quarter financial results before the market opens on Tuesday, August 4, 2020. The Company will host a conference call and webcast at 11:00 a.m. ET that

The Beasley Media Group family is celebrating the life of our dear friend and team member Bob McCurdy who recently passed after a courageous and long battle with cancer.
